item.description:
Join us for a night of experiencing the amazing music of Entrain!

Originating in Martha's Vineyard, Entrain's musical styles range from rock, blues, calypso and ska, to zydeco, jazz and funk - often within the same song. Thier musical goal is to "bring everybody together in the spitit of peace, love, fun and a ton of drums!" You can read more about them or listen to some of their albums on their website: www.entrain.com

Whether you like to dance or not, this energetic music will get anyone's feet stomping, hips moving, and body grooving.

This is a $15 cash cover at the door, so no need to purchase tickets in advance.

We may look to eat dinner in Davis Square at Red Bones, or other local eatery...more details to follow.

Ciao,
Gina
item.how_to_find_us: We will be either near the bar or on the dance floor!

group.name: Innitou Ski Runners & Rider's Activities Club of New England

item.name: Entrain - LIVE at Johnny D's in Davis Square
